thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 14 of 634
thread.title: Lady Ophelia

author: Lady Ophelia
title: Lady Ophelia
text: A great place to find a variety of unique items for a reasonable price. The quality isn't top-notch, but it's acceptable, especially given the price. Unfortunately, returns are difficult, and if you want free shipping, you should expect a wait of about a week. Items also have different processing times, and some are only available for shipping after 7-14 (or more) days, but all these details are included. The size charts are very helpful (make no purchase without consulting one). Also, beware of foreign transaction fees.
